favourite.article: I love that so many heart filling songs of the Recovery are being recovered as NEW..Praise You Lord for ever Loving Faithfulness..Lord Jesus We Love You!
Lord we give ourselves to You, O Lord work in us!
Lord I just give myself to You, because I love You.

Lord Jesus, so busy today, I really feel tired and weak, but Lord Jesus, You're so strong and You're my power! Oh, Lord Jesus, You're my all—You're my all in all.You gave me life indeed;You're all I need,You're all I need.

Amen. i'm touched by this song... He really saves me not just this minute but HOUR BY HOUR DAY BY DAY... I thank the Lord that His love keeps on constraining us till we say that...
"Lord, I just open up to You; I let You do what You want to do. Lord, I just give myself to You, ’Cause I love You—Lord, I do." <3
I just want to let the Lord do whatever He wants to do. Lord Jesus I love You!
O That We May Love You Fully With The Love You First Loved Us-Amen. Jesus I love You. Just By Saying I Love You I Can Really Love You Lord!I Love You Lord! Amen.
What a great song! And what a beautiful melody. It really touches my heart. O Lord, I love You and don't mind saying it to the whole whole world.
Oh Lord Jesus! 'Cause I love You-Lord do! Jesus we love You!
Real peace and joy I never knew, Until in spirit I touched You, so— Lord, I just open up to You; I let You do what You want to do. Lord, I just give myself to You, 'Cause I love You—Lord, I do.
I love the Lord, He heard my call and came to see about me. Thank You Jesus for all You have done and all that You are about to do, Amen!
Thank You Jesus for Your Grace and Mercy. You alone are my Lord and Saviour!!
I love You my Lord and I want to thank You for so many thing which are countless.
"And now I can't live without You. You're my only delight.
Amen... Praise the Lord.. May we continue to enjoy the Lord Jesus by singing hymns and praises songs to Him!!! Hallelujah!!!
I love this song soo much......I truly love the Lord Jesus...
Lord Jesus I just love You! You are my all.
